thread.title: Fifth Harmony’s Lauren Jauregui and her ex-girlfriend posed for the dreamiest “coming out” photoshoot
thread.title_full: Fifth Harmony’s Lauren Jauregui and her ex-girlfriend posed for the dreamiest “coming out” photoshoot

author: Johnni Macke
title: Fifth Harmony’s Lauren Jauregui and her ex-girlfriend posed for the dreamiest “coming out” photoshoot
text:
Fifth Harmony’s Lauren Jauregui and her ex-girlfriend posed for the dreamiest “coming out” photoshoot Who says working with your ex isn’t beautiful? Fifth Harmony’s Lauren Jauregui and her ex-girlfriend’s beautiful photoshoot proves that love doesn’t have to end when the romance does.
On Wednesday, photographer Nicole Cartolano revealed stunning photos of Jauregui and her ex, Lucy Vives. The gorgeous photoshoot shows that love has no bounds and breakups aren’t always messy.
Although the Fifth Harmony singer and Vives were dating at the time the photos were taken, their attitudes towards the shoot now are equally as beautiful.
The two former lovebirds posed together in November in New Orleans. Each shot is more stunning and intimate than the next.
Throughout the “Bare With Me” photo collection you can see the love and respect each woman has for the other.
2016 Wildflyme's most loco adventure| Muses: @lucyvives @laurenjauregui | Styling: @kasstagrama |#35mm #unretouched #wildflyme #nicolecartolano 
A post shared by Nicole Cartolano (@wildflyme_) on Mar 22, 2017 at 12:59am PDT 
“Both girls trusted me to photograph them together as sort of a coming-out, but they were nervous how their families would respond and the publicity they’d attract, especially from the Latin American community,” Cartolano told MTV News .
“‘Bare With Me’ is a compromise which allowed us to describe what Lauren called ‘love in the 21st century,'” she added. Bare With Me @lucyvives : @wildflyme_ : @kasstagrama 
A post shared by laurenjauregui (@laurenjauregui) on Mar 22, 2017 at 12:44pm PDT 
“We felt like the way that these photographs are presented are very disarming, sensual, and empowering all at once,” she said.
“And they’re not provocative or with ill intent. It was important to use their voices to show the world that this is OK, this is acceptable, in the gentlest way possible.”
@lucyvives & @laurenjauregui Wearing @americanapparelusa @kendallandkylie @lulus @meundies @dolcevita @nissajewelry Photo by @wildflyme_ Styled by me 
A post shared by Keeping It Kassey (@kasstagrama) on Mar 22, 2017 at 4:15pm PDT 
Even though Jauregui just came out in November as bisexual , she’s known Vives for a long time.
Despite the fact the two have broken up since the pictures were taken, Cartolano revealed they are happy the photos exist.
“They agreed, and Lauren said this: that it’s a reminder of a really good moment in time. Because at the time, they did really like each other. And it was a very good memory,” the photographer explained. Dress: @wowcouture_usa : @wildflyme_ (this is film ps she's a G) : @kasstagrama 
A post shared by laurenjauregui (@laurenjauregui) on Mar 22, 2017 at 12:28am PDT 
We love the singer and photographer’s attitude about the photos. The love was real and pure at the time they were taken, so why not celebrate what was?
